dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: PWB; Printed Wiring Board; FR4; Printed Wiring Assembly; PWA; Printed Circuit Assembly; PCA
PWB; Printed Wiring Board; FR4; Printed Wiring Assembly; PWA; Printed Circuit Assembly; PCA

common:classification.name: ILCD 1.1
common:classification.common:class: Metal and semimetal elements and ions

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The printed wire board (PWB) is an essential part of a total electronic circuit packaging system. It contains an epoxy glass resin or substrate that creates interconnection and attaches PCB elements to realize a circuitry that proves helpful in developing electronic devices. The PWB is a substrate consisting of reinforced glass fiber and epoxy resin bonded onto a layer of copper foil. Known as FR4, it is the most common form of PCB substrate. After all of its electrical components are attached, a PWB becomes a printed wiring assembly (PWA), which has a similar meaning to a printed circuit assembly (PCA).
印制电路板（PWB）是整个电子电路封装系统的重要组成部分。它包含一种环氧玻璃树脂或基板，用于建立互连和连接印刷电路板元件，以实现有助于开发电子设备的电路。PWB 是一种基板，由强化玻璃纤维和环氧树脂组成，粘合在一层铜箔上。它被称为 FR4，是最常见的印刷电路板基板形式。在连接所有电气元件后，PWB 成为印刷布线组件 (PWA)，其含义与印刷电路组件 (PCA) 相似。
